Atomic, I have downloaded the torrent once again and I've had no problems. Sometimes if you are using a wireless network data can be lost within the transfer, so this may cause your torrent to fail the hashcheck and appear corrupt. Also, you should run a virus scan to check for a virus attacking your filesystem, if you do not have an anti-virus program, I would suggest Malware-Bytes, as it free and powerful. Hope this helps
-CameroSaur
